attributes.action: Censure Mr. Johnson for his appalling attitude to the victims of child abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
LBC interview 13/03/19.
Mr. Johnson said "six million pounds spaffed up against a wall in the investigation of historic child abuse"
attributes.background:
During an LBC interview with Boris Johnson MP he used sexual language to dismiss the investigation of child abuse. Often abuse would be of a sexual nature.
Mr. Johnson has no regard for the victims of abuse.
This behaviour falls far short of the standard expected of persons in public office.

rejection.details: The views of individual MPs are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
